Utilities
=========

The ``dash_interactive`` module includes utility classes that support logging,
data collection, and graph building for agent execution visualization.

.. contents:: On This Page
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Overview
--------

The utilities provide infrastructure for:

- **LogCollector**: Captures execution logs and builds graph structures for visualization

These utilities are designed to work seamlessly with the application classes and
visualization components.

Documentation
-------------

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   log_collector
